title: Online Fraud and Unauthorized Transactions
description: When you become victim of online fraud, unauthorized bank transactions, or digital payment scams

rights.title: Right to Zero Liability Protection
rights.description: Right to protection from liability for unauthorized electronic transactions if reported promptly

rights.title: Right to Dispute Resolution
rights.description: Right to raise disputes and get resolution for fraudulent transactions through banking ombudsman

rights.title: Right to Compensation for Bank Negligence
rights.description: Right to compensation if unauthorized transaction occurred due to bank's system deficiency
rights.legalBasis: RBI Master Direction on Digital Payment Security

actionSteps.title: Immediately Block Cards/Accounts
actionSteps.description: Immediately contact bank to block debit/credit cards and freeze accounts to prevent further fraud

actionSteps.title: File FIR with Police
actionSteps.description: Lodge FIR at nearest police station or cyber crime cell with all transaction details

actionSteps.title: Report to Bank in Writing
actionSteps.description: Submit written complaint to bank with FIR copy and transaction details for investigation

actionSteps.title: Report to Cyber Crime Portal
actionSteps.description: File complaint on National Cyber Crime Reporting Portal (cybercrime.gov.in)

actionSteps.title: Approach Banking Ombudsman
actionSteps.description: If bank doesn't resolve within 30 days, file complaint with Banking Ombudsman

sources.title: RBI Guidelines on Customer Liability for Unauthorized Transactions
Information Technology Act, 2000 - Cyber Crime Provisions

variations: Money debited from account without my knowledge
Received fake payment link and lost money
